Project

Roadmap

Roadmap

Discover what's coming next for SpectralLogs. Our journey towards becoming the most powerful and elegant logging solution.

v0.1.7 - Current

Foundation & Core Features

Established the core logging functionality with beautiful colors, TypeScript support, and basic plugin system.

  • High-performance buffered output
  • Rich color support (HEX, RGB, named)
  • TypeScript-first design
  • Basic plugin system
  • CLI tools and diagnostics
  • Node.js and Web support
  • Error formatting and stack traces
✓ Released
v0.2.0 - Next

Performance & Stability Improvements

Focus on performance optimizations, bug fixes, and enhanced stability for production environments.

  • Dynamic buffer optimization
  • Improved TypeScript definitions
  • Better encoding support
  • Enhanced error handling and retry logic
  • Race condition fixes
✓ Released
v0.3.0 - Planned

Advanced Logging Features

Introduce structured logging, advanced filtering, and powerful new capabilities for complex applications.

  • Structured JSON logging
  • Advanced filtering and search
  • Conditional logging with predicates
  • Log rotation and archiving
  • Correlation IDs and distributed tracing
  • Custom formatters and serializers
  • Log sampling and rate limiting
• In Progress
v0.4.0 - Planned

Rich Plugin Ecosystem

Expand the plugin system with a comprehensive collection of integrations and tools.

  • Analytics and metrics plugins
  • Plugin SDK and development tools
  • Hot-swappable plugin loading
  • Plugin configuration management
○ Planned
v0.5.0 - Planned

Enhanced Developer Experience

Focus on making SpectralLogs the most developer-friendly logging solution with advanced tooling.

  • Real-time log analysis dashboard
  • Advanced CLI with live monitoring
  • VS Code extension with IntelliSense
  • Automated migration tools
  • Performance profiler and recommendations
○ Planned
v1.0.0 - Future

Production Ready & Enterprise Features

The stable 1.0 release with enterprise-grade features and comprehensive platform support.

  • Enterprise security and compliance
  • Multi-platform optimization (React Native, Electron)
  • Edge computing support (Cloudflare, Vercel)
  • Advanced analytics and insights
  • Comprehensive documentation
○ Planned

Get Involved

SpectralLogs is an open-source project and we welcome contributions from the community. Help us shape the future of logging!

Contribute on GitHub Report Issues View on npm
